name: Handmade Plate from the WOBBLY PLATES SERIES - made to order - ceramic tableware
description:
Fun in your Kitchen - a Party on your Table!

The Wobbly Plates will turn every dinner into a sunny culinary fiesta!
It's up to you; a table setting in one color, every family member his or hers favorite color or just a big mix of colors.

The Wobbly Plate measures approximately 9.5 inches/ 25 cm in diameter and is available in 15 colors:

white
yellow
mustard
tangerine
orange
red
pink
purple
lavender
baby blue
ocean blue
turquoise
green 
lime 
black

The lace- textured plates, are made from white stoneware clay, glazed with a glossy glaze and are dishwasher, microwave and food safe. 

Each plate measures approximately 9.5 inches/ 25 cm in diameter.

Note that each plate is individually made by hand and therefore variations will occur. 
Colors may vary slightly due to monitor differences.

The Wobbly Plates are made to order. Please allow 3-4 weeks for shipping!

name: Handmade Small Bowl from the WOBBLY PLATES SERIES - made to order - ceramic tableware
description:
Fun in your Kitchen - a Party on your Table!

The Wobbly Bowls are available in 2 sizes.

The mini Wobbly Bowl is ideal for soy sauce, hot wasabi, olives, delicious dried herbs or spices and 'wobbles' perfectly with the Oval Platters!
The small bowl measures approximately 4 inches/ 10 cm in diameter and 1.2 inches/ 3 cm in height.
 
The large Wobbly Bowl is an absolute must-have!
It's the perfect bowl for a delicious spaghetti dish, a one person summer salad or a big bowl of soup!
The large bowl measures approximately 8 inches/ 20.5 cm in diameter and is 2 inches/ 5 cm tall.

The bowls are made from white stoneware clay, glazed with a glossy glaze and available in 15 colors:

white 
yellow 
mustard 
tangerine 
orange 
red 
pink 
purple 
lavender 
baby blue 
ocean blue 
turquoise 
green 
lime 
black

Note that each Wobbly Plate or Bowl is individually made and therefore variations in the lace pattern will occur. 
Colors may vary slightly due to monitor differences.

The Wobbly Bowls are made to order.
Please allow 3-4 weeks for shipping!
-let me know what color you prefer for your Wobbly when checking out-

name: Handmade Small Oval Platter from the WOBBLY PLATES SERIES - made to order - ceramic tableware
description:
Fun in your Kitchen - a Party on your Table!!

The Wobbly Oval Platters are available in 2 sizes.

The small version is a perfect size to present tapas goodies, veggies or home-baked cookies!
It measures approximately 10 1/2 inches- 27 cm long and 5 1/2 inches- 14 cm wide.

The large one measures approximately 14 inches/ 35.5 cm long, 9.8 inches/ 25 cm wide and 1.5 inches/ 3.5 cm in height.
This one is a perfect size for serving fish, a veggie dish or colorful delicious tapas.
It also 'wobbles' up perfectly with the small bowls or the small platter!

The colorful platters with lace-motif are made from white stoneware clay and glazed with a glossy glaze and are available in 15 colors:

white 
yellow 
mustard 
tangerine 
orange 
red 
pink 
purple 
lavender 
baby blue 
ocean blue 
turquoise 
green 
lime 
black

Note that each Wobbly plate, bowl or platter is individually made and therefore variations in the lace pattern will occur. Colors may vary slightly due to monitor differences.

The Wobbly Platters are made to order. 
Please allow 3-4 weeks for shipping!
-let me know what color you prefer for your Wobbly when checking out-
